member.name: T:OverroidModel.Battle
member.summary: Battle of cards by comparing their values.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.#ctor(System.UInt16,OverroidModel.PlayerAccount,OverroidModel.PlayerAccount)
member.param: Current battle number
Player who places battle card first,
Player who places battle card second.

member.name: P:OverroidModel.Battle.Round
member.summary: Current battle number.

member.name: P:OverroidModel.Battle.AttackingPlayer
member.summary: Player who places battle card first.

member.name: P:OverroidModel.Battle.DefendingPlayer
member.summary: Player who places battle card second.

member.name: P:OverroidModel.Battle.DetectedCardName
member.summary: Card name detected by defending player if he did.

member.name: P:OverroidModel.Battle.Winner
member.summary: Owner of the card that won this battle.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.PlayerOf(OverroidModel.Card.CardName)
member.summary: Get Owner of the named card that is placed in this battle.
member.param: Name of one of the cards that are placed in this game.
member.exception: Thrown when named card is not placed in this battle.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.CardOf(OverroidModel.PlayerAccount)
member.summary: Get the card placed by given player.
member.param: one of the game players.
member.exception: Thrown when given player has not placed a card yet..

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.CardOf(OverroidModel.Card.CardName)
member.summary: Get the Card with given name that is placed in this battle.
member.param: Name of one of the cards that are placed in this game.
member.exception: Thrown when named card is not placed in this battle.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.HasCardOf(OverroidModel.PlayerAccount)
member.summary: Check if named card has been set in this battle.
member.param: Name of a card to check.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.HasBothPlayersCards
member.summary: Check if both attacking and defending players have placed a card.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.HasFinished
member.summary: Check if the battle has already decided its winner. Additional card effects might be triggered even if this method returns true.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.IsDrawBattle
member.summary: Returns true if battle has ended and there is no winner.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.WinningStarOf(OverroidModel.PlayerAccount)
member.summary: Get number of stars that given player got in this battle.
member.param: A Player in this game.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.SetCard(OverroidModel.PlayerAccount,OverroidModel.Card.InGameCard,System.Nullable{OverroidModel.Card.CardName})
member.summary: Set a card to this battle.
member.param: Player who places a card.
Card to be placed.
The card name if the player is detecting a card.
member.exception: Thrown if the player has already set a card.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.ReplaceCard(OverroidModel.PlayerAccount,OverroidModel.Card.InGameCard)
member.summary: Replace the card in this battle with another card.
member.param: Player who places a card.
Card to be newly placed.
member.exception: Thrown if the player has not set any card yet.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.JudgeWinnerByValues
member.summary: Compares card values and determines the battle winner if not determined yet.
member.exception: Thrown if any player did not set a card..

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.SetToReverseCardValues
member.summary: Changes the rule of this battle from greater-wins to lesser-wins.

member.name: M:OverroidModel.Battle.SetSpecialWinner(OverroidModel.Card.CardName)
member.summary: Set a card that wins by its effect.
member.param: Name of card to win,

member.name: T:OverroidModel.Card.CardName
member.summary: Card name that identifies each card in game.

member.name: T:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.Charm
member.summary: Effect of Idol (5).

member.name: T:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.Espionage
member.summary: Effect of Spy (7).

member.name: T:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.Hack
member.summary: Effect of Hacker (2).

member.name: T:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming
member.summary: Value that determines when card abilities will be triggered.

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming.FIRST
member.summary: Just after battle cards are opened, mainly for disabling other card effects. ///

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming.SECOND
member.summary: Next of FIRST timing, mainly for copying another card effect.

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming.PRE_BATTLE
member.summary: For most card effects that will triggers before comparing card values.

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming.SINGULARITY
member.summary: Singularity effect triggers before other post-battle effects because battle ends immediately

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.Effects.EffectTiming.POST_BATTLE
member.summary: For most card effects that will triggers after comparing card values.

member.summary: Value that determines when card abilities will be triggered.

Current game object

Current game object

member.summary: Opponent cannot see at all.

member.summary: Opponent can guess you have the card but cannot see where it is.

member.summary: Revealed by card effect. Opponent can see the card and tell where it is.

member.name: F:OverroidModel.Card.CardVisibility.Opened
member.summary: Revealed in battles.

member.summary: How cards in player's hand looks from the opponent.

member.summary: Reveals the card by card effect and make it visible from all players.
